in.risk.utility

Class apiRiskGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.risk.utility.apiRiskGame

  • public class apiRiskGame
extends Object
    This class contains all the methods related to game start up phase, reinforcement phase and fortify phase
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Kashif Rizvee, Mohit Rana

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean addPlayer(String nm)
      This method adds player when number of player selected initially during select player method
      void askPlayerToPlaceArmies()
      This method executes sub methods for placing armies in their countries
      void distributeArmies()
      This method distributes number of armies as per number of players selected
      void distributeCards()
      This method distributes cards to all players as per game logic.
      void fortify()
      This method is related to fortification phase of the game where player can transfer his armies from one country to another country.
      void getArmiesFromCards()
      This method is about trading of cards and getting armies in return.
      void initializeDeck()
      This method creates deck of card at initial stage as per game logic
      void initiallyPlaceArmies()
      This method places army on country for every player at initial phase of the game
      void initialPlayer()
      This method stores current player which is at index 0
      void initialPlayerCountries()
      This method allocates countries randomly and add it to the player's list
      void loadMap()
      This method is related to loading of risk game map
      static void main(String[] args)
      This method is the main method where all the other methods are called related to various phases of the game.
      void nextPlayer()
      This method calls next player in the game and also calls method for play cards
      void placeInitialArmies()
      This method places number of armies in the countries owned by player as per the user input
      void placeReinforcementArmies()
      This method places armies in their countries as per reinforcement phase of the game.
      void playCards()
      This method asks player to trade their cards in return of the armies as per game's logic.
      void reinforcementPhase()
      This method executes sub method for reinforcement phase of the game
      void selectPlayers()
      This method is about selecting players between 3 and 6

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        This method is the main method where all the other methods are called related to various phases of the game. This is the method from where game is called and loaded.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap()
        This method is related to loading of risk game map

      • selectPlayers

        public void selectPlayers()
        This method is about selecting players between 3 and 6

      • addPlayer

        public static boolean addPlayer(String nm)
        This method adds player when number of player selected initially during select player method
        Parameters:
        nm -
        Returns:
        Returns false if number of player selected is greater than 6

      • initialPlayer

        public void initialPlayer()
        This method stores current player which is at index 0

      • distributeArmies

        public void distributeArmies()
        This method distributes number of armies as per number of players selected

      • initializeDeck

        public void initializeDeck()
        This method creates deck of card at initial stage as per game logic

      • distributeCards

        public void distributeCards()
        This method distributes cards to all players as per game logic. Distribution of cards will be ratio of number of countries to number of players

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer()
        This method calls next player in the game and also calls method for play cards

      • initialPlayerCountries

        public void initialPlayerCountries()
        This method allocates countries randomly and add it to the player's list

      • initiallyPlaceArmies

        public void initiallyPlaceArmies()
        This method places army on country for every player at initial phase of the game

      • getArmiesFromCards

        public void getArmiesFromCards()
        This method is about trading of cards and getting armies in return. Armies added will be as per the game logic.

      • placeInitialArmies

        public void placeInitialArmies()
        This method places number of armies in the countries owned by player as per the user input

      • playCards

        public void playCards()
        This method asks player to trade their cards in return of the armies as per game's logic.

      • placeReinforcementArmies

        public void placeReinforcementArmies()
        This method places armies in their countries as per reinforcement phase of the game.

      • askPlayerToPlaceArmies

        public void askPlayerToPlaceArmies()
        This method executes sub methods for placing armies in their countries

      • reinforcementPhase

        public void reinforcementPhase()
        This method executes sub method for reinforcement phase of the game

      • fortify

        public void fortify()
        This method is related to fortification phase of the game where player can transfer his armies from one country to another country.
